xyz.morphia.mapping.experimental

Class PropertyHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.morphia.mapping.experimental.PropertyHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReferenceHandler

    public abstract class PropertyHandler
extends Object
    Defines a specialized handler for a property. This is used to customize how Morphia reads and writes value for a property. When a handler is defined, the standard serialization process is skipped. Implementations of PropertyHandler behave similarly to Codecs defined in the Java driver.
    See Also:
    Codec
